com.googlecode.aluminumproject.converters
Class ClassBasedConverter<S,T>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.converters.ClassBasedConverter<S,T>
Type Parameters:
S - the type of the values to convert
T - the type of the converted values
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter<S>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteArrayToStringConverter, ObjectToStringConverter, StringToBooleanConverter, StringToFileConverter, StringToLocaleConverter, StringToTypeConverter
public abstract class ClassBasedConverter<S,T>
extends Object
implements Converter<S>

Abstract superclass for all converters that are able to convert from a single source type into a single target type, both of which are classes.

          Creates a class-based converter.

Method Detail

supportsSourceType

public boolean supportsSourceType(Class<? extends S> sourceType)
Description copied from interface: Converter
Checks whether this converter supports converting values from a certain source type. Normally, classes express this by implementing Converter with the supported type (so most implementations would return true from this method), but there could be specialised cases in which not all subtypes of that type are supported by the converter.

Specified by:
supportsSourceType in interface Converter<S>
Parameters:
sourceType - the source type to check
Returns:
true if this converter is able to convert values from the given source type, false otherwise

supportsTargetType

public final boolean supportsTargetType(Type targetType)
Description copied from interface: Converter
Checks whether this converter supports converting values into a certain target type.

Specified by:
supportsTargetType in interface Converter<S>
Parameters:
targetType - the target type to check
Returns:
true if this converter is able to convert source values into the given target type, false otherwise

convert

                      Type targetType,
                      Context context)
               throws ConverterException
Description copied from interface: Converter
Converts a value of the source type into a supported target type.

Specified by:
convert in interface Converter<S>
Parameters:
value - the value to convert
targetType - the type to convert the value into
context - the context in which the conversion takes place
Returns:
the converted value
Throws:
ConverterException - when the given target type is not supported or when something goes wrong while converting the value
